item.text: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Timothy our brother,
to the saints, the faithful brothers and sisters in Christ, at Colossae. Grace and peace to you from God our Father!
We always give thanks to God, the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, when we pray for you,

since<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> about <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.

Your faith and love have arisen<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223">from</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="606">laid up</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> you have <st data-num="4257" class="">heard about</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st><n id="3" />

that has <st data-num="3918" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="2531">Just as</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> this gospel<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2592" class="">bearing fruit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="837" class="">growing</st>, <st data-num="2531">so</st> it has <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> been bearing fruit and growing<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the first <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">understood</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

You <st data-num="3129" class="">learned</st> the gospel<n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1889" class="">Epaphras</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="4889">fellow slave</st><n id="2" />—a<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">minister</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st>—
who also told us of your love in the Spirit.
For this reason we also, from the day we heard about you, have not ceased praying for you and asking God to fill you with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,

so that you may <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="516" class="">worthily</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> and <st data-num="699" class="">please</st> him <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">all respects</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="2592" class="">bearing fruit</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deed</st>, <st data-num="837" class="">growing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

being <st data-num="1412" class="">strengthened</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="2904" class="">might</st> <st data-num="1519">for</st> the display of<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">patience</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">steadfastness</st>, <st data-num="3326 5479">joyfully</st>

<st data-num="2168">giving thanks</st> to the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> who has <st data-num="2427" class="">qualified</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3310" class="">share</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints’</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2819" class="">inheritance</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>.

<st data-num="3739">He</st> <st data-num="4506" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3179" class="">transferred</st> us <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="26" class="">loves</st>,<n id="1" />
in whom we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins.
He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation,

for all things in heaven and on earth were created in him—all things, whether visible or invisible, whether thrones or dominions, whether principalities or powers—all things were created through him and for him.
He himself is before all things, and all things are held together in him.
He is the head of the body, the church, as well as the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, so that he himself may become first in all things.
For God was pleased to have all his fullness dwell in the Son
and through him to reconcile all things to himself by making peace through the blood of his cross—through him, whether things on earth or things in heaven.
And you were at one time strangers and enemies in your minds as expressed through your evil deeds,

<st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="3570">now</st> he has <st data-num="604">reconciled</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">physical</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> to <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st>, <st data-num="299">without blemish</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="410" class="">blameless</st> <st data-num="2714" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>—

if indeed you remain in the faith, established and firm, without shifting from the hope of the gospel that you heard. This gospel has also been preached in all creation under heaven, and I, Paul, have become its servant.
Now I rejoice in my sufferings for you, and I fill up in my physical body—for the sake of his body, the church—what is lacking in the sufferings of Christ.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> of the church <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="3622" class="">stewardship</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—<st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>—in order to <st data-num="4137" class="">complete</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

that is, the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> that has been kept <st data-num="613" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generations</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> has <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> been <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="1107">make known</st> to them the <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, <st data-num="3739">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaim</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st> by <st data-num="3560" class="">instructing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">mature</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
Toward this goal I also labor, struggling according to his power that powerfully works in me.
